content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 (14 ounce) cans sweetened condensed milk" )

content.text: 0) Combine condensed milk, milk, cream, vanilla, salt and fruit in freezer canister of ice cream maker.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "condensed milk"@11:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "milk"@27:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cream"@33:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vanilla"@40:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@49:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "fruit"@58:63 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "freezer canister of ice cream maker"@67:102 / TOOL )
	)
)
